title: Darning Sampler, 1785
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: running (pattern darning) and cross stitch on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description:
Darning sampler with five pattern crosses. Hemmed on all four sides.
Five holes were cut from the plain weave foundation fabric and the holes darned to simulate five different weaves; twill, herringbone twill, bird's eye diaper and two float patterns. Inscription in cross stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Darning Sampler, 1785.
1785. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: running (pattern darning) and cross stitch on plain weave. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-25.
